item.description: Wine Reception and Tasting class to be held on February 28th from 6:30- 8:00 pm hosted by Cave a Vin with Guest Speaker Eric Litchfield - Wine Director for Slocum & Sons of North Haven, CT. Cost of event is $35.00 per person. Reservations are required in advance and a credit card is needed to secure your spot. Featuring an International Selection of exciting New & Old Worlds Wines… Small Plates of delicious Appetizers will be served including Fruit & Cheese, Cured Meats, Hummus & Fresh Tomato Bruschetta. $35 per person, plus tax & gratuity Casual Attire Reservations 203.777.6206

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Global Wine Tasting and Discussion with Guest Speaker Eric Litchfield
